attributes.additional_details: The people of this country fully understand that this country have debts that have to be re paid but at what price,just after the second world war Europe and the uk were devastated and a Europe wide rescue plan to rebuild Europe and we need one now,the people of this country do not care what the IMF and the OCED think, is it not common sense that when you take billions out of the system  people have less to spend, business have less customers less money , less jobs high crime, jobs lost funding cut, when did common sense escape those in power...please have a re think now
